title: gAna sudhara rasa
sahitya:
gAna sudhA rasa pAnamu jEsE mAnavulE dhanyulu I bhuvilO


anupallavi

  I nara dEhamu sthiramani teliyaka gAna lOluNi vAsudEvudi maravaka


caraNam    yOgi vAreNyDaina nArada muni krpatO bhAgavatara grEsharuDani velasina 
tyAgarAjuni mari mahAtmulanu dalacukoni rAga layAdulanu bAguga telusukoni
